title: B Oranges to B Tube Dark Cover
description: This is a good one way smoke to get an advantageous angle on your enemy as they are pouring through under B Tube.

title: A Site to A Pipes Dark Cover
description: This is a good one way smoke to prevent an A Site push and also to get a quick kill on someone approaching your smoke.

title: A Rafter to A Pipes Dark Cover
description: This is a good one way smoke to prevent the attackers from executing on A Site and also allowing you to get a pick on someone slow peaking from A pipes.

title: B Orange to Mid Blue Paranoia
description: This is a good paranoia to get a quick pick or valuable information from middle.

title: A Site to A Pipes Paranoia
description: This is a good paranoia to blind your opponent and take an aggressive peak on them or to stop an immediate rush.

title: A Shop to A Site Paranoia
description: This is a good Paranoia for the left box on A Site from A Shop.

title: B Main to B Site Dark Cover
description: This is a good set of dark covers to block both the defender side entrance points onto B Site.

title: B Site to Back B Site Paranoia
description: This is a good paranoia for back B Site. This is especially helpful during a B execute.

title: A Pyramid to A Bridge Dark Cover
description: This is a dark cover for A Site to create a one-way against defenders rotating to the site.

title: Mid Nest to B Elbow Dark Cover
description: This is a good Dark Cover for B Elbow from Mid Nest to create a one-way smoke.

title: B Site Paranoia
description: This is a good Paranoia for B Site.

title: A Site Paranoia
description: This is a good Paranoia for A Site.

title: A Site Dark Cover
description: This is a good dark cover to create a one-way smoke for A Site.

title: Top Mid to Left Mid Pillar Dark Cover
description: This is a good dark cover for Mid Pillar to prevent enemies from pushing up one side of Mid.

title: Early Round Paranoia For A Main From Attacker Spawn
description: Here's an aggressive early round Paranoia for A Main from Attacker Spawn that's useful for pushing players out of common angles in A Main so that your team can take space in A Main.

title: Standard A Site Attack Smokes
description: Here are two standard smokes for attacking A Site that can be used at the same time, or interchangeably.

title: B Site Smoke / Ultimate Ability Combo
description: Here's an aggressive Dark Cover / Ultimate ability combo for B Site that can potentially help you check, or even clear B Tower for your team as the rest of your team takes B Site. This is a difficult combo to time well - but if you can pull it off, you will save some time for your team by checking or clearing B Tower for them.

title: A Site Ultimate Teleport To Check B Site
description: Here's a great way to use your Ultimate ability to check if there are players on A Site, that's useful when you or you and your teammates are far away from A Site and you think that an enemy player could be planting the spike on A Site.

title: B Site Ultimate Teleport To Check A Site
description: Here's a great way to use your Ultimate ability to check if there are players on A Site, that's useful when you or you and your teammates are far away from A Site and you think that an enemy player could be planting the spike on A Site.

title: Aggressive Early Round B Bench Paranoia From B Link
description: Here's an aggressive early round Paranoia for B Bench from B Link that should typically be done with the help of a teammate who takes some space in B Arcade / B Bench alongside the paranoia, while potentially even challenging Attackers pushing into B Bench / B Arcade.

title: Aggressive Early Round A Main Paranoia From A Rope
description: Here's an aggressive early round Paranoia for A Main from A Rope, that should typically be done with the help of a teammate who takes some space in A Main alongside, while potentially even challenging Attackers pushing into A Main.

title: Standard A Site Defense Smokes
description: Here are two standard smokes for defending A Site that can be used at the same time, or interchangeably.

title: B Site Dark Cover Default Smokes
description: A good set of default smokes to block common defender entry points onto B Site.

title: B Site Post Plant Dark Cover
description: A  good Dark Cover for post plant that allows you to see enemies defusing while shrouding their vision.

title: Start Round One Way Smoke For Market
description: Here's a simple, but effective one way smoke that you can place at the start of the round to prevent Attackers from taking aggressive Mid control.

title: Mid Doors Dark Cover
description: A good one way smoke for Mid Doors that will allow you to see your enemies before they see you.

title: C Site Execute Shrouded Step + Paranoia
description: Use this Shrouded Step + Paranoia combo to aggressively take space on C Site while the rest of your team pushes in through the C Site Arches Chokepoint.

title: Aggressive Early Round A Main Teleport + Paranoia
description: use this aggressive early round A Main Teleport + Paranoia to increase your ability to support your team's efforts to contest space in A Main.

title: Standard C Site Execute Dark Covers
description: Use these standard smokes when pushing onto C Site with your team.

title: Standard A Site Exec Dark Cover Placement
description: Use these standard smokes when pushing onto A Site with your team.

title: B Site Standard Exec Smokes
description: Use these standard smokes when pushing onto B Site with your team.

title: Inner C Site Delay Dark Cover from C Hall
description: Use this Dark Cover to make it more difficult for enemy players to take control of inner C Site, and force them to use more risky, or more costly tactics to take control of Site.

title: Aggressive A Main Dark Cover to Contest Space
description: Use this Dark Cover to contest space in A Main with your team, and if the situation calls for it use your paranoia to make it even more difficult for enemy players to attempt to contest your team's efforts in A Main.

title: B Upper Retake / Delay for B Main
description: This is used ideally right as the enemy team is pushing into B Site, so that you can make it much more difficult for the enemy team to follow through with their execute, while also setting you and your team up for easy picks.

title: C Site Chokepoint Delay Dark Cover + Paranoia
description: Use this C Site chokepoint Dark Cover + Paranoia combo to delay / break up the Attackers into C Site.

title: Default Dart for Garage Info From Haystack
description: Here's an extremely strong dart you can use for gaining information at Garage, as it will scan almost all of it.

title: C Site Execute Dart From C Long
description: Enable your teammates with this fast, strong dart when taking the C Site. You can combine your ultimate with the dart, Defenders will have a tough time keeping hold of site.

title: Utility Break Shockdart for Front B Site
description: Use this dart to break Cypher's Tripwire, or Killjoy's Alarmbot. This will provide added pressure on Defenders at the start of the round.

title: A Site Execute Dart from A Long
description: Enable your teammates taking the A Site with this dart, as you'll be able to clear most of site and the Short cubby on site.

title: Default Dart for A Long From Outside A Lobby
description: Here's a great dart to throw when contesting for A Long control. You can also use this dart for information mid round.

title: C Long To Right Side C Site Recon Bolt
description: This is a great arrow that scans the majority of C Site, with a relatively quick setup that you can do near the C Long Spawn Barrier. Be careful though, the arrow looks like it may scan players close behind default, but players can avoid this arrow if they are directly behind Default.

title: C Long To Front C Default Shockbolt
description: This is useful for stopping players from peeking C Long from the back left side of Default on C Site.

title: A Long To A Site Reconbolt
description: This is useful for revealing players playing in commonly held spots on A Site from A Long and is a great support arrow for your teammates waiting to push in to A Site.

title: Mid Courtyard To B Site Reconbolt
description: This is useful for revealing players in B Site including the immediate right and left side of the entrance of B Site, making it easier for you and your team to push in from Mid Courtyard.

title: Fast C Site Retake Dart From C Link
description: Use this powerful retake dart to allow yourself to scale the site with your teammates.
